titleStmt.title: An alarum to the parish, called, Olives Southwark for to awaken them out of the state of carnal security: and that they hearken to God's witness, which alwayes calls to that which is good, and doth, and ever will, stand a witness against that which is evil.
titleStmt.author: Tompkins, Anthony, d. 1699.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: "Written the 30th of the 1st Moneth, 1671. Anthony Tompkins.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
